title: talkAItive
description:
Navigating the growth of a community can be a challenging task for creators. As the volume of feedback swells, it can be nearly impossible to track and incorporate fan praises and criticisms into future content.

That's where our product comes into play:
Learn whether your users like/dislike your content with our sentiment analysis. 
Capture recurring topics from audience feedback.
Dive directly into actionable insights, skip the distraction and drain of sifting through countless toxic comments.
